fields.name: ReadID
fields.description: No ordering by ARID. Out of order Reads to same address may be observed at Target.

fields.name: WriteID
fields.description: No ordering by AWID. Out of order Writes to same address may be observed at Target.

fields.name: NC
fields.description: Non-Coherent. 0:Use coherent mode as indicated by incoming transaction. 1:Enforce non-coherent transaction.

fields.name: NSX
fields.description: Security Level required to access this region. NSX[0] is mapped to NS(non-secure). NSX[1] is mapped to NSE(non-secure extention, reserved for future use)

fields.name: HUI
fields.description: This bit indicates the Home unit identifier of the access

fields.name: Size
fields.description: This field indicates a binary number from 0 to 31 from which the region's Size is calculated as (Size of IG) * 2 ^(Size +12) bytes

fields.name: HUT
fields.description: This bit indicates the Home Unit Type- 0: System Memory, 1:Peripheral Storage

fields.name: Valid
fields.description: This bit indicates if the region is valid - 0: Invalid mapping, 1:Valid region mapping

fields.name: AddrLow
fields.description: Lower order bits 43:12 of the base address of the region

fields.name: AddrHigh
fields.description: Higher order bits 51:44 of the base address of the region

fields.name: MIG2AIFId
fields.description: Active function ID for 2 way interleaving. Selects the function ID index to be used for interleaving of DMI within the selected MIGS

fields.name: MIG3AIFId
fields.description: Active function ID for 3 way interleaving. Selects the function ID index to be used for interleaving of DMI within the selected MIGS

fields.name: MIG4AIFId
fields.description: Active function ID for 4 way interleaving. Selects the function ID index to be used for interleaving of DMI within the selected MIGS

fields.name: MIG8AIFId
fields.description: Active function ID for 8 way interleaving. Selects the function ID index to be used for interleaving of DMI within the selected MIGS

fields.name: MIG16AIFId
fields.description: Active function ID for 16 way interleaving. Selects the function ID index to be used for interleaving of DMI within the selected MIGS

fields.name: Valid
fields.description: Memory Interleave Group Set valid, when set the MIGS specified in AMIGS field is being used for DMI interleaving else MIGS 0 is used by default

fields.name: AMIGS
fields.description: Active Memory Interleave Group Set in use currenlty when Valid is set
